messages.subject: [Yaoi] Short fic needs Beta reader
messages.msgSnippet: Dear friends, I was wondering if anyone here would like to beta read a 3,600 word fic which features Serizawa, Saitou and Yamazaki Susumu (cameo with Niimi and
messages.messageBody:
Dear friends,

I was wondering if anyone here would like to beta read a 3,600 word fic
which features Serizawa, Saitou and Yamazaki Susumu (cameo with
Niimi and Aioi---later known as Aioi Tayuu).

Just to reassure people who may be afraid of yaoi--this story does not
have graphic sex. I think this story is at best PG-13.

So I was really a good girl (*^_^*).

Please email me at secretarytocapt3(at)hotmail.com with "[Yaoi] Short
fic needs Beta reader" in the subject line and I'll send you the story as
an attached file tomorrow morning (I can't be online tonight).

I appreciate any help I can get! I really need grammar hounds to read
this work too. The story will be featured at http://www.samurai-on-
samurai.com which is {only} for readers above the age 18.

~secretarytocapt3
